BAR Metrics

Budget Adherence Ratio compares spending rate vs time progression to keep you on track with your financial goals.

ğŸ’¾

Offline-First

Works fully offline with local SQLite database and background sync. Your data is always available, even without internet.

ğŸ“±

Material 3 Design

Beautiful glassmorphic navigation, smooth animations, and modern design system that adapts to light and dark modes.

ğŸ”’

Multi-User Ready

userId filtering on all queries with anonymous tokens now, OAuth ready for the future. Secure data isolation built-in.

ğŸ—ï¸

Clean Architecture

MVVM pattern with Cubit state management, repository pattern, and feature-first organization for maintainability.

âš¡

Background Sync

Non-blocking isolate-based sync keeps UI smooth while syncing in the background. No jank, no delays.

ğŸ“¹ Watch the full demo (3 minutes)

Why Centabit? â€‹

Centabit v0.5 is a complete architectural evolution designed for production. Unlike v0.4's prototype architecture, v0.5 implements:

  • Local-First Architecture: SQLite is the single source of truth

  • Reactive Streams: Automatic UI updates via BLoC pattern and Drift's reactive queries

  • Type-Safe Database: Drift provides compile-time query validation

  • Isolate-Based Sync: Background sync without blocking the UI

  • Feature-First Organization: All related code lives together

    Ready to Take Control of Your Budget?

    Be the first to know when Centabit launches!

Technology Stack â€‹

Built with modern Flutter tools and best practices:

TechnologyPurpose
FlutterCross-platform UI framework
flutter_bloc (Cubit)Reactive state management
DriftType-safe SQLite ORM
FreezedImmutable data classes
go_routerDeclarative navigation
get_itDependency injection
Dart IsolatesBackground sync
Material 3Modern design system

Key Features â€‹

  • Budget management with category allocations
  • Transaction tracking with search and filtering
  • Budget Adherence Ratio (BAR) metric
  • Offline-first with local SQLite storage
  • Multi-user support with userId filtering
  • Interactive charts (bar and pie)
  • Material 3 design with dark mode
  • Background sync infrastructure

Explore all features â†’

What's Different in v0.5? â€‹

Complete architectural rewrite from v0.4:

  • Feature-first organization
  • Better state management (Cubit pattern)
  • Type-safe everything (Freezed + Drift)
  • True offline support
  • Multi-user ready

Read the full evolution story â†’

Development Approach â€‹

Centabit evolves based on real user needs, not rigid timelines. Features are prioritized from waitlist feedback and actual user requests. Join the free waitlist to influence what gets built next!
